message.body: Ohhh man! Robin Williams committed suicide
What time are you going to be coming down?
Would you be able to leave a little later? Otherwise I won't be able to go. Like 6:00-6:15?
But don't worry if you can't!!
I don't think Phuong would be able to fit everyone in her car.
So I take the answer as a yes? Assuming "you" is jenny.
Sam, is it easier for you to take me since I live so close to you? I don't know where Scott lives so I don't know what works more.
Please tell me that you got that. I'm gonna get a ride with Sam since it'll be easier for her to pick my up. I didn't know where Scott lives.
Hey, yup, just read through the messages that came in. Okay, see you there!
